select t1.* FROM (select DISTINCT sound.a_no, album.a_name, album.a_cover , sound.s_no, sound.s_name from album album join sound sound on album.a_no = sound.a_no join singer singer on singer.a_no = sound.a_no and sound.s_no = sound.s_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where lower(sound.s_name) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or lower(artist.artist_name) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by a_no) t1
where rownum <= 3

select artist.artist_name, artist.artist_no from sound sound join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where sound.a_no=#{a_no} and sound.s_no=#{s_no}

select t1.* FROM (select DISTINCT a_no, a_name, a_cover, a_date, a_publishing, a_agency , artist.artist_name, artist.artist_no from album album join artist artist on album.artist_no = artist.artist_no where lower(album.a_name) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or lower(artist.artist_name) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or lower(a_publishing) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or lower(a_agency) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by a_no) t1
where rownum <= 3

select t1.* from (select artist_no, artist_name, artist_nation, artist_company, artist_type, artist_group, artist_member, artist_profile, artist_info1, artist_info2 from artist where lower(artist_name) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%')) t1

select t1.* from (select DISTINCT b_no, b_title, b_content, b_writer, b_date, playlist.l_image from board board join playlist playlist on board.l_no = playlist.l_no and board.m_id = playlist.m_id where lower(b_title) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or lower(b_content) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') ) t1
where rownum <= 3

select t2.* from (select rownum rnum, t1.* FROM (select DISTINCT sound.a_no, album.a_name, album.a_cover , sound.s_no, sound.s_name from album album join sound sound on album.a_no = sound.a_no join singer singer on singer.a_no = sound.a_no and sound.s_no = sound.s_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where (lower(sound.s_name) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or lower(artist.artist_name) like lower('%'||#{keyword}||'%')) order by a_no) t1 ) t2
